name: Ark: Survival New Mod Version
description:
Ark: Survival Evolved is a highly successful survival crafting game that often gets forgotten about. It's led to countless spinoff titles and expansions and seems to be constantly seeing an influx of new players. It takes a lot of what Minecraft did so well and mashes that with everyone's love of dinosaurs and weird creatures.

In many of the popular survival crafting games out there today, it's mostly about supplying a sandbox of fun mechanics and systems and letting the players develop their own memorable experiences through simply playing together.
